original_text: But those farmers said to each other, “This is the son of our master. The garden will belong to him when his father dies. We should kill the son and then the garden will be ours.”
korean_text: 그 농부들이 서로 말하되 이는 상속자니 자 죽이자 그러면 그 유산이 우리 것이 되리라 하고

sentences.original_text: But those farmers said to each other
This is the son of our master
The garden will belong to him
and then the garden will be ours
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 정원은 우리의 것이 될 것입니다
